record.field: The following moves in distribution "%(distribution)s" have a different quantity distributed:\n%(moves)s.
Distribution "%(distribution)s" cannot be deleted because it is in "Done" state.
There is already a draft distribution ("%(distribution)s") in warehouse "%(warehouse)s".
Distribution line "%(line)s" must have one of "Production" or "Location" fields empty.
Distribution line "%(line)s" must have a value in one of "Production" or "Location" fields.
